name: Soul Knight: The Forest of Spirits
name_original: Soul Knight: The Forest of Spirits
description:
A lone knight finds himself lost in the abyss of an enigmatic cave. Your mission is to walk the path forward and discover a way out, facing challenges at every step. With unique abilities, the knight must progress through the sinister darkness, avoiding obstacles and finding innovative solutions to his puzzles. The knight can only count on his unshakable soul to face the uncertainties of the unknown and unravel the secrets hidden in the depths of the cave in this journey that requires cunning and bravery.

The controls are the mouse to control the knight's soul and move it where you want, keyboard to move in the desired directions and space for acquired skills.

Be sure to use your soul wisely to advance the paths.


With each different room you'll find new challenges, be it different mechanics or suspicious paths. Make sure you make the best decision or you will end up dying!


There will be 75 different levels in which there will be progressive difficulty, exciting music on your journey and highly challenging but rewarding gameplay.
